pages.title: Resonous
pages.text: With these new materials, it's possible to craft a device which vibrates in frequency with your soul. While this doesn't sound all that practical, it uses the energy from this resonance to coalesce an incredibly pure type of quartz - $(item)Radiant Quartz$().

This material can be used in contruction of many things which will all resonate in tune with the soul of whomever placed them.$(br2)Unfortunately, these resonators are not without cost - only 3 can be placed at a given time, lest they do lasting harm to your soul.
Creating the $(item)Radiant Resonator$() using the $(l:quests/chap4/02forestritual)Ritual of the Forest$().
